meanings.definition: A person who breaks in or tames wild horses.
meanings.sent1: The broncobusters worked hard to train the wild horses.
meanings.sent2: The broncobusters were skilled at taming the untamed horses.
meanings.sent3: The broncobusters had a wild time trying to calm the unruly horses.
meanings.sent4: The broncobusters were like horse whisperers, calming the wild animals.
meanings.sent5: The broncobusters' job was to transform wild horses into gentle companions.
